attributes.action: Create a  Road Fund from taxes and duty raised from motorists and road transport .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Roads for our current and future needs,
that the government creates a real "Road Fund" from the taxes raised from the motorist and road transport , so that the road infrastucture is fit for purpose by the vehicles and owners that pay those taxes ,therefore forming a relationship between revenue raised and the roads needed to drive them on , less than a sixth of taxes are actually spent on the road network ,those taxes should not be  lost into the consolodated fund , and spent on non transport related projects.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
